title: @Riot - can you atleast adress your aware of Brands champ breaking bug?
body:
I've seen at-least twenty topics over the last three patches pointing out how to re-create/the issue with Brands ult occasionally not bouncing (If there's only one champion near by). Having your ult not working over multiple patches/being completely ignored is getting terrible.

This bug can happen 3-4 times a game easily - to the point I don't even think the original bug fix was tested (How long did the original fix take a year?) as almost every single Brand main noticed it in there first game/takes no special way to recreate.

I know Brands not a popular Champ - but Champ breaking bugs should be a top priority. Rather then see another twenty topics over the next month being completely ignored/can we get anyone to at-least address your aware/care?

replies.body:
Hiya! 

So, this definitely isn't in the realm of skins, so I don't have a ton of context here, but wanted to pop in and let you know that I've gone ahead and checked the status of this issue.

It's a known issue on our end. It appears that it'll be resolved in patch 6.3 if all goes according to plan!

well there ya go, a riot comment first post =^D

that being said, i think it has come up before now, and they have been aware, thats why the fix is coming out.... did u search the forums first? im just curious
